txt.en:
'It is not enough to oppose the Iron Crown in words alone—we must act if we are to free Carn Dûm and Angmar from their evils!

'If you continue the fight against the Iron Crown and challenge their return to Carn Dûm, I shall see to it that you are rewarded.

'For those who fight for Angmar honour us all!'


<rgb=#FF0000>NOTE: You must complete the quest 'The Fight for Carn Dûm (Daily)' to advance this quest.</rgb>

Muirál can be found at Bail Avarc in Angmar.

You have done much to aid those opposing the Iron Crown at Carn Dûm. You should talk to Muirál.

<rgb=#FF0000>NOTE: Bail Avarc can initially only be accessed via stable-master routes. Bail Avarc can be reached via the stable-masters at Esteldín, Gath Forthnír, and the stables of Rivendell.</rgb>
Talk to Muirál at Bail Avarc
The Free Peoples of Middle-earth strive to wrest Carn Dûm from the Iron Crown and defeat them once and for all.
'You have done us a great service, [placeholder].\n\n'I pray the evils that haunt Carn Dûm will at last be banished from our land!'

The Free Peoples of Middle-earth strive to wrest Carn Dûm from the Iron Crown and defeat them once and for all.\n\n<rgb=#FF0000>NOTE: You must complete the quest 'The Fight for Carn Dûm (Daily)' to advance this quest.</rgb>
